description: Explorers are scouts, settlers, and surveyors hardened to the challenges of the wild. Few adventuring parties would dare the wilderness without an experienced explorer to guide them.

combatCharacteristics.combatProficiencies: Explorers have weapon proficiency with all missile weapons and with all tiny, small, and medium melee weapons. They have armor proficiency with medium, light, and very light armor.
combatCharacteristics.combatProgression: Like fighters, explorers advance in attack throws and saving throws by two points every three levels of experience.

abilities.name: Combat Proficiency
abilities.description: Select one class proficiency from the explorer's proficiency list.

abilities.name: Starting Equipment
abilities.description: An explorer starts with a short bow and an old spear.

abilities.name: Combat Progression
abilities.description: Explorers advance in attack throws and saving throws.

startingClassPowers.description: Explorers gain a +1 bonus to avoid surprise. When using Adventuring proficiency to search or listen, he succeeds on a proficiency throw of 14+.
Explorers can ambush any vulnerable opponent, getting a +4 bonus on attack throws and dealing an extra die of damage.
Explorers gain a +1 bonus to initiative and avoid surprise.
